short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces common churning acronyms with their actual meaning

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple Google Chrome extension to replace most the r/churning related acronyms with their meaning when navigating the churning and awardtravel subreddits.
